TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DurableOperationContext extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The WF3 types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new WF4 types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Provides a set of static methods to gain access to related information and functionality.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void AbortInstance() cil managed

Docs.summary: Purges the current durable service instance from memory after the operation has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method call will fail unless the `ConcurrencyMode` value for your service is set to `Single` and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableServiceAttribute.SaveStateInOperationTransaction%2A> is set to `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void CompleteInstance() cil managed

Docs.summary: Unloads the durable service instance from memory and deletes it from persistence after the operation has completed.
Gets the service ID of this service instance.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.Guid> that contains the ID of the service.
Docs.returns: A <xref:System.Guid> that contains the ID of the service.
